shopItems.name: Club
shopItems.flavourText:
A simple wooden club.

Rather uninspiring,
but gets the job done.

shopItems.name: Spear
shopItems.flavourText:
The spears are light,
but a bit blunt.

Still, they look... ok?

shopItems.name: Gladius
shopItems.flavourText:
Here we go,
a real sword.

Looks pretty nice,
as long as you're not
on the receiving end.

shopItems.name: Mace
shopItems.flavourText:
This thing hurts - a lot.

A crowd favourite,
mostly because of
all the spikes.

shopItems.name: Trident
shopItems.flavourText:
Basically a fancy spear.

Not as many spikes
as the mace, though...

shopItems.name: Wooden Gladius
shopItems.flavourText:
The prize that will
earn you your freedom.

Pretty much useless
in a fight.
